item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Rue De L'Espoir on Hope Street

Come over to the East Side and experience the warm atmosphere of the Rue. This has long been one of my personal fave restaurants, AND on Mondays they have $1 Hor D'oeuvres with the purchase of a drink. How convenient! Once you've been there, you'll be back - they have a great brunch too! Come down and give it a try!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: This is a nice big bar space, but you can't miss us!
item.name: Monday Night Happy Hour - Rue De L'Espoir!
